item.title: Pure CSS Salesforce-like progressbar Control
item.description: Introduction This article covers several CSS techniques: using LESS, using display: flex and some CSS hacks. You can download the complete source code on github. Using LESS LESS is CSS preprocessor which allows extending CSS with some useful features. You can learn more about it here. In this project, I use LESS variables and functions which as you can see later, allow me to work with colors in a cleaner way.
